title: The G icon is constantly spinning but does not underline mistakes
content:
If the Grammarly G icon is constantly spinning but does not underline mistakes, it typically points to a network issue. Here's how to troubleshoot this behavior:
Clear your browser’s cache by following the steps described in
this article
.
Pass our
self-diagnostic tests
.
If the WebSockets test fails, check out this
article
. We recommend that you work with your system administrator to resolve this issue.
